title: PSA: Healing Cuts are a thing
body:
I know this has been a thing very recently, but why do people complain about how absurd it is to lane against any champ who innate healing in their kit. I apologize if this is hard to swallow for some, however i feel like this need to be said again, as im sure it has been noted and spoken about before. So here is goes.

**_If you are in a game against:_** {{champion:8}} {{champion:266}} {{champion:36}} {{champion:420}} {{champion:50}} 
**_Please for the love of all that is a smart thing to do: _** Buy a grievous wound item.
Here are some examples you can purchase early that can help you in lane or overall through out the match: {{item:3123}} {{item:3165}} {{item:3076}} 

I understand you want to get to your core items, but if you are having a issue in lane, getting these can help you survive it. You can even take {{summoner:14}}  too.
There are a few more champs that i know who have innate healing, but i feel these are the ones i feel are most complained about.
Also one last thing. Even a Support can build one of these items. 

Thank you for reading and i hope you all do well in your games.

replies.body: Yasuo out heals all of those without having healing in his Kit.
However that requires an item. Grevious wounds still applies to Bloodthirster and I’m pretty sure that {{item:3076}} and {{item:3075}} counter Bloodthirster when the user has enough armor and HP.

PSA
LifeSteal well out scales GW

Crit is 225%
GW is 50%

Cirt based champs are at a net gain even with GW

First of all a crit damage increase doesn’t cancel out a healing reduction. Correct me if I am wrong, but grevious wounds is applied after the life-steal/healing is calculated.

So if a crit heals a champion for 200 hp (after crit modifiers, life-steal, heal power, etc), then grevious wounds (40%) is applied to reduce that heal to 120 hp.

Crit’s don’t make life-steal a net positive against grevious wounds. If anything it makes grevious wounds even more effective because now that damage increase from the crit makes the percentage reduction take more from the heal than before.
The only time crit champs with life-steal are at a significant net positive gain is when the other team stupidly don’t have any grevious wounds items or they don’t deal enough burst damage to kill the champ before he/she can lifesteal.

If you want to argue more I’m currently doing the math to provide more evidence. I am also willing to calculate the net gain of health from a crit with life-steal onto a tank with thornmail.

PSA: unless you're constantly trading with vlad, in which case straight up damage is often better, buying GW vs him is actually kind of a trap. 

Focusing more on damage/core itemization often lets you bully harder.

Vlad is not played as he was intended currently. He plays more like an AP assassin than an AP bruiser. You're probably going to want MR more than GW to out trade him.

____________

Buying GW when you're behind is an even worse idea to try to 'beat' these champs, btw. 

Its more effective to buy GW early vs champions like Yuumi and Soraka than champions that constantly heal unless you have a way to consistently apply GW that they can't avoid. 

________________

GETTING GW WILL NEVER HELP YOU SURVIVE. IT HAS NO INTERACTION WITH YOUR HEALTH BAR. 

 If you're getting wrecked in all-ins, GW will not save you. If you're getting wrecked in trades, GW will not save you, it will only mitigate the degree to which you got wrecked, and unless you're constantly applying it, they're going to keep healing anyway. 

Buy GW when you're ahead. Buy health/resistances when you're behind.

Rushing a bramble vest as a tank/juggernaut is still a good idea against the AD healers like {{champion:266}} {{champion:114}} {{champion:39}} {{champion:75}} {{champion:420}} or even {{champion:36}} if he is going an AD build instead of a tank build.

I wish they would make an MR version of Bramble vest and Thornmail. That would be EXTREMELY HELPFUL against {{champion:8}} {{champion:50}} {{champion:36}} {{champion:82}} {{champion:19}} {{champion:57}} if he is going full AP for some reason, and any AP assassin that rushes {{item:3146}}.

Bramblevest is good vs ALL fighters, not just those with sustain. Just saying.

Bramblevest is a good item because its resistances, damage, and GW. All things that significantly help with trading.

Yeah but that is because almost all fighters deal attack damage, so the reflection of damage back to them is very useful.

I’m confused on what your intentions are with this comment. Are you trying to make me look like an idiot with a simple statement? Or is there something else you are implying that I’m not getting.

Simply stating that bramblevest is a special case among the GW items. 

Its far, far better than Executioner's Calling, the only other item that can be purchased relatively early to help in trades where it will have the most impact.

Thanks for the clarification, thought that your comment was trying to insult me in a passive aggressive manner lol. I didn’t want to retort in an insulting way and make the conversation become a petty argument lol

And yeah I agree with that, I wish that there was a magic resistance equivalent to Bramblevest that tanks or fights could use... either that or Riot could make Thornmail a dual armor and MR item. I would really like an armor and magic resistance thornmail item tbh, that would be so useful against Vlad, mundo and especially akali lol.

I Rush GW when vs a Healing laner and pick it up later if the Enemy Support is a Healer.

It DOES matter but not enough.  It should matter more OR lower how much LifeSteal there is in the game.
Because people get mad when they actually have to think rather than just being able to flat out beat something with no effort
if a vlad is fed u wont get anything out of building gw as he will just roll thru ur team and destroy any non-tanky champ in his path but for the others sure

I buy Calling, I ping it, I suggest my teammates buy a GW item (no Ignites), but no response. It's the only source of GW on our team. Then I'm the only one who can kill Mundo, so he steamrolls us.

You can lead a horse to water, but you can't make him drink.

personally, i feel GW and visage should be just outright removed from the game, and healing should be rebalanced with those changes, so your not hurting drain tanks as hard because fuckboi vlad has healing in his kit
